preConditions.onFailMessage: Code item BDMOASAT01 already exists for table ApplicationType
preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from CodeTableItem where tablename = 'ApplicationType' and code = 'BDMOASAT01';

changeSet.comment: Updating existing codetable with new code. Add new code only if it is not already present.

changeSet.author: l.balasubramanya

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO CodeTableItem (TABLENAME, CODE, DESCRIPTION, ANNOTATION, COMMENTS, ISENABLED, SORTORDER, LOCALEIDENTIFIER, LASTWRITTEN, VERSIONNO) VALUES ('CaseCatTypeCode', 'OASPC00001', 'Old Age Security', '', '', '1', 0, 'en', systimestamp, 1);
changeSet.comment: Updating existing codetable with new code. Add new code only if it is not already present.

changeSet.author: l.balasubramanya

preConditions.onFailMessage: Code item OASPC00001 already exists for table CaseCatTypeCode and locale 'en'
preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from codetableitem where TABLENAME = 'IntakeProgApplStatus' AND CODE ='IPAS1004' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER = 'en' and description='Denied';
select count(*) from codetableitem where TABLENAME = 'IntakeProgApplStatus' AND CODE ='IPAS1004' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER = 'fr' and description='Refusé';

changeSet.sql: UPDATE CODETABLEITEM SET DESCRIPTION = 'Closed' WHERE TABLENAME = 'IntakeProgApplStatus' AND CODE ='IPAS1004' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER = 'en'; UPDATE CODETABLEITEM SET DESCRIPTION = 'Closed_fr' WHERE TABLENAME = 'IntakeProgApplStatus' AND CODE ='IPAS1004' AND LOCALEIDENTIFIER = 'fr';
changeSet.comment: Updating existing codetable with new code. Add new code only if it is not already present.

changeSet.author: l.balasubramanya
